name: Space Brawl (Mohamed ElShab)
description:
This game was made for the Brackeys game jam 2021.

Two space ships in space, the ship that survives the longest wins, avoid the falling meteorites, the rotating planets' gravitational forces and the sun dragging both players to it.

Controls:

Red Ship:

Up Arrow Launches Engine

Down Arrow Reduces Velocity

Right and Left Arrow Rotate The Ship

White Ship:

W Launches Engine

S Reduces Velocity

A and D Rotate The Ship

Game Development: Mohamed ElShab

Game Design: Youssef Lasheen

Special thanks to: JEAN MORENO (JMO) from the asset store for his Cartoon FX
